citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 p.m. on
13-NOV-19.
Contact was made with staff leaving the facility to obtain supplies. They were unable to modify the schedule to
accommodate an inspection.
